resources.string:
We at V360 would like to position ourselves as your ONE STOP SHOP.

 V360 is the Pakistan’s leading Modeling Agency. Having an elite reputation for providing top-class international models, hostesses and promotional staff which is second to none.


We provide high-quality services including model training, events management and exclusive productions to all forms of agencies and companies, including all forms of marketing communications. V360 has transformed the professional promotional industry across the Pakistan. From its global corporate headquarters in Lahore, Pakistan.
 
 Our Services:


• Model Management • Print Production • Promoters / Hostesses
 • Video / Still Production • Exhibition Staff 
 • a High End Wedding/Event Planner 
 • eCommerce Management • eCommerce Outsourcing 
 • Social Media Marketing • Fashion Shows • Studio Rentals
 • Location Permits • Digital Marketing
 • Set Decoration • Stylist
 • Portfolio Services • Pre-production• Crewing and Casting
 • Post-production

INBOX IF YOU NEED ANY OF OUR SERVICES !!
We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.
